channel.title: Blog on Dane Hager's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Dane Hager's Blog

item.title: First Post
item.description: In working through the HarvardX Data Science program, we studied the gapminder data set to look at life expectancy rates across countries. So, firstly, we load the packages: library(tidyverse) ## Warning: package 'tidyverse' was built under R version 3.4.3 ## -- Attaching packages --------------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.2.1 -- ## v ggplot2 2.2.1 v purrr 0.2.4 ## v tibble 1.4.1 v dplyr 0.7.4 ## v tidyr 0.7.2 v stringr 1.2.0 ## v readr 1.
